title: UK Commission Publishes Recommendations for Reform and Development of the Law on Digital Assets
description: The Law Commission of England and Wales has published its “recommendations for reform and development of the law on digital assets.” The recommendations, which seek to secure the U.K.’s position as a global crypto hub, are intended “to provide a comprehensive legal foundation for digital assets which will allow these new technologies to flourish.” Accommodating […]

title: $3.9T Asset Manager Fidelity Officially Files Application for Spot Bitcoin ETF – Will it Propel BTC Price to New ATH of $100,000? Report
description: Fidelity Investments, a $3.9 trillion asset manager, has officially applied for a spot Bitcoin ETF, joining the growing list of financial institutions vying to offer regulated investment products for Bitcoin. title: Crypto Lawyer Shares His Take On Ripple’ ODL XRP Sales
description:
